## Location

Where is the documentation issue?
(e.g. README, API reference, specific method, examples page)

## Issue

What is unclear, missing, or incorrect?

## Suggested improvement (optional)

If you have a concrete suggestion for improvement, describe it here.

## Additional context

Any other information that might help (screenshots, links, references).
